attributes.action: Stop British Schools Opening until Covid-19 has a vaccine
attributes.additional_details: The government should be concentrating on a Solution to Covid-19 and stop trying to kill people off due to their incompetence. They need to stop spending money on themselves with crooked contracts and spend that money they are making on Home Schooling until this has a cure/immunisation.
attributes.background: Children have a high immunity to Covid-19 but can still get it and be carriers. Sending children back to school will spread the virus 100 fold and kill the carriers parents. Stop Boris and his corrupt government from killing off the British Population like Trump is doing in America.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319292
